Item.Name: CLICK_HERE
Item.InitializeValue: Click here for ADAM web site - Cliquez ici pour accéder au site Web du SIMA

Item.Name: AC_TYPE
Item.Hint: Use list to see valid A/C types./Appuyer pour liste de type d'aeronefs.

Trigger.Name: POST-TEXT-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 ACCESS_AC_TYPE INTEGER;
 AC_INDEX_NO INTEGER;
 ANSWER BOOLEAN;
 CNT NUMBER;
 alert_but number;
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT ACCESSIBLE_AC_TYPE
 FROM TBL10_ROLE_SECURITY
 WHERE UPPER(rtrim(USERNAME)) = UPPER(RTRIM(:Global.USER));
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR2 IS
 SELECT BINARY_INDEX_NO 
 FROM TBL00_AIRCRAFT_TYPE 
 WHERE AC_TYPE = :ONE.AC_TYPE; 
BEGIN
IF :ONE.ac_type IS NULL THEN
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('STOP_ALERT',TITLE, 'No AC Types');
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('STOP_ALERT',ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,'This is an invalid AC Type. Please re-enter.');
 if alert_but = alert_button1 then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
END IF; 
 
SELECT COUNT(*) INTO CNT FROM FIL21_LOCK_UNLOCK_AIRCRAFT WHERE AC_TYPE = nvl(:ONE.AC_TYPE,'goober');
IF :one.ac_type is not null and CNT = 0 THEN
 set_alert_property('BAD_AC_TYPE_ALERT',title,'No AC Type');
 set_alert_property('BAD_AC_TYPE_ALERT',ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT,'This is a valid AC Type but there are no '||:one.ac_type||' aircraft in this database. Continue?');
 alert_but := show_alert('BAD_AC_TYPE_ALERT');
 IF ALERT_BUT != ALERT_BUTTON1 THEN
 :ONE.AC_TYPE := '';
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF; 
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO ACCESS_AC_TYPE;
 CLOSE PTI_CURSOR;
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR2;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR2 INTO AC_INDEX_NO;
 CLOSE PTI_CURSOR2;
 IF BITAND(ACCESS_AC_TYPE, AC_INDEX_NO)+0 = 0 THEN
 MESSAGE( 'Invalid A/C Type for' ||
 ' Username entered; Re-Enter/Type d''aéronef' ||
 ' non-valide en fonction de l''utilisateur.Entrer de nouveau.', ACKNOWLEDGE);
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 MESSAGE( 'Invalid A/C Type for' ||
 ' Username entered; Re-Enter/Type d''aéronef' ||
 ' non-valide en fonction de l''utilisateur.Entrer de nouveau.', NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE; 
 END IF;
END IF;
IF INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST,'VIEWING') > 0 AND :GLOBAL.CONNECT_STRING = 'REPOSITORY' THEN
 set_item_property('one.fixer', navigable, property_false);
 set_item_property('one.fixer', enabled, property_false);
 set_item_property('one.fixer_description', navigable, property_false); 
 :ONE.FIXER := 'REPO';
END IF; 
END ;

Item.Name: FIXER
Item.Hint: Use list to see valid Fixer Units./Appuyer pour liste des unites repar..

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
begin
declare
 cnt number;
 alert_but number;
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT DESCRIPTION
 FROM TBL03_FIXER_UNIT
 WHERE FIXER_UNIT = :ONE.FIXER ;
begin
IF :ONE.FIXER IS NULL THEN
 NULL;
 RETURN;
END IF;

SELECT COUNT(*) INTO CNT FROM TBL03_FIXER_UNIT
WHERE FIXER_UNIT = :ONE.FIXER;
IF CNT = 0 THEN
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('STOP_ALERT',ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT, 'Invalid Fixer Unit/UIC. Please re-enter.');
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('STOP_ALERT',TITLE, 'Invalid Fixer Unit/UIC');
 ALERT_BUT := SHOW_ALERT('STOP_ALERT');
 :ONE.FIXER := '';
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
ELSE
 select count(*) into cnt from fil21_lock_unlock_aircraft
 where ac_type = :one.ac_type and fixer_unit = :one.fixer;
 IF CNT = 0 THEN
 set_alert_property('FIXER_ALERT',alert_message_text,'No aircraft type '||:one.ac_type||' in this database under Fixer Unit '||:one.fixer||'. Continue?');
 ALERT_BUT := SHOW_ALERT('FIXER_ALERT');
 if alert_but = alert_button1 then
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :ONE.FIXER_DESCRIPTION ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 close pti_cursor;
 MESSAGE('Fixer Unit is missing from validation table. Please contact ADAM Help desk.', ACKNOWLEDGE);
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 MESSAGE('Fixer Unit is missing from validation table. Please contact ADAM Help desk.', NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 ELSE
 close PTI_CURSOR;
 END IF; 
 else
 :one.fixer := '';
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 end if;
 END IF;
END IF;

 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :ONE.FIXER_DESCRIPTION ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 MESSAGE('Fixer Unit is missing from validation table. Please contact ADAM Help desk.', ACKNOWLEDGE);
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 MESSAGE('Fixer Unit is missing from validation table. Please contact ADAM Help desk.', NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF; 
end;
END;

Trigger.Name: KEY-NEXT-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
begin
 declare
 cnt number;
 begin
 
SET_DEFAULTS ;
SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CURSOR_STYLE,'DEFAULT');
If :One.Ac_Type Is Null Or
 :One.Fixer Is Null
Then
 Message('Please Enter Aircraft Type And/Or Fixer Unit before proceeding');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
End If;
-- Updated By GNR On May 07,1996 For Using parameters
 If INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, 'IMPOUNDING') > 0 then
 goto IMPOUND;
 End if; 

 IF :GLOBAL.USER = 'PLASMA' THEN
 IF :GLOBAL.IS_DEP = 'FALSE' THEN
-- Check to see if this AC Type/Fixer has been configured for plasma display
 select count(*) into cnt from tbl44_status_display
 where ac_type = :global.ac_type
 and fixer_unit = :global.fixer;
 if cnt = 0 then
 message('The Plasma display has not yet been configured for AC Type '||:global.ac_type||' at UIC '||:GLOBAL.FIXER||'. Please contact the ADAM Administrator.',ACKNOWLEDGE);
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 message('The Plasma display has not yet been configured for AC Type '||:global.ac_type||' at UIC '||:GLOBAL.FIXER||'. Please contact the ADAM Administrator.', NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 CLEAR_BLOCK ;
 CHECK_FAILURE ;
 :PARAMETER.P_USER := :GLOBAL.USER;
 :one.User := :parameter.P_user;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSE
 CALL_FORM('ADAMSTAT');
 END IF;
 ELSE
 MESSAGE('Plasma Display cannot be used on Deployable ADAM',ACKNOWLEDGE);
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 MESSAGE('Plasma Display cannot be used on Deployable ADAM',NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF; 
 ELSE
 IF :SELECTION = '1' THEN
 :GLOBAL.LANG := 'FRA';
 --FJC20190613_S2376995: Implementation for new AC Type 295. If selected,
 -- user will be directed to 363 menu instead of main menu.
 if :one.ac_type = '295' then
 CALL( 'MMain_363_F');
 else
 CALL( 'MMAIN_F' ) ;
 end if;
 CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSIF :SELECTION = '2' THEN
 :GLOBAL.LANG := 'ENG';
 --FJC20190613_S2376995: Implementation for new AC Type 295. If selected,
 -- user will be directed to 363 menu instead of main menu.
 if :one.ac_type = '295' then
 CALL( 'MMain_363_E');
 else
 CALL( 'MMAIN_E' ) ;
 end if;
 CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSE
 MESSAGE ('Invalid selection.Re-enter./ Choix non valable.Inscrivez de nouveau.' ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
 END IF;
 
--
 CLEAR_BLOCK ;
 CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
 :PARAMETER.p_USER := :GLOBAL.USER;
 :one.user := :Parameter.P_user;
--
 RETURN ;
--
 << IMPOUND >>
 IF :SELECTION = '1' THEN
 :GLOBAL.LANG := 'FRA';
 CALL( 'MIMPOU_F' ) ;
 CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSIF :SELECTION = '2' THEN
 :GLOBAL.LANG := 'ENG';
 CALL( 'MIMPOU_E' ) ;
 CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSE
 MESSAGE ( 'Invalid selection. Re-enter./ Choix ' ||
 ' non-valable. Inscrivez de nouveau.' ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
--
 CLEAR_BLOCK ;
 CHECK_FAILURE ;
 :PARAMETER.P_USER := :GLOBAL.USER;
 :one.User := :parameter.P_user;

 RETURN ;
 end;
 end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-MOUSE-CLICK
Trigger.TriggerText:
SET_DEFAULTS ;
SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CURSOR_STYLE,'DEFAULT');
If :One.Ac_Type Is Null Or
 :One.Fixer Is Null
Then
 Message('Please Enter Aircraft Type And/Or Fixer Unit before proceeding');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
End If;

-- Updated By GNR On May 07,1996 For Using parameters
 If INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, 'IMPOUND') > 0 then
 goto IMPOUND;
 End if; 

 IF :GLOBAL.USER = 'PLASMA' THEN
 IF :GLOBAL.IS_DEP = 'FALSE' THEN
 CALL_FORM('ADAMSTAT');
 ELSE
 MESSAGE('Plasma Display cannot be used on Deployable ADAM',ACKNOWLEDGE);
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 MESSAGE('Plasma Display cannot be used on Deployable ADAM',NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF; 
 ELSE
 IF :SELECTION = '1' THEN
 :GLOBAL.LANG := 'FRA';
 --FJC20190613_S2376995: Implementation for new AC Type 295. If selected,
 -- user will be directed to 363 menu instead of main menu.
 if :one.ac_type = '295' then
 CALL( 'MMain_363_F');
 else
 CALL( 'MMAIN_F' ) ;
 end if;
 CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSIF :SELECTION = '2' THEN
 :GLOBAL.LANG := 'ENG';
 --FJC20190613_S2376995: Implementation for new AC Type 295. If selected,
 -- user will be directed to 363 menu instead of main menu.
 if :one.ac_type = '295' then
 CALL( 'MMain_363_E');
 else
 CALL( 'MMAIN_E' ) ;
 end if;
 CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSE
 MESSAGE ('Invalid selection.Re-enter./ Choix non valable.Inscrivez de nouveau.' ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
 END IF;
 
--
 CLEAR_BLOCK ;
 CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
 :PARAMETER.p_USER := :GLOBAL.USER;
 :one.user := :Parameter.P_user;
--
 RETURN ;
--
 << IMPOUND >>
 IF :SELECTION = '1' THEN
 
 :GLOBAL.LANG := 'FRA';
 CALL( 'MIMPOU_F' ) ;
 CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSIF :SELECTION = '2' THEN
 :GLOBAL.LANG := 'ENG';
 CALL( 'MIMPOU_E' ) ;
 CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSE
 MESSAGE ( 'Invalid selection. Re-enter./ Choix ' ||
 ' non-valable. Inscrivez de nouveau.' ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
--
 CLEAR_BLOCK ;
 CHECK_FAILURE ;
/* Updated By GNR(ISM) On May 08,1996 
 Reassigning if the user decides to go back into IMPOUND Menu with
 different A/c Type */
 :PARAMETER.P_USER := :GLOBAL.USER;
 :one.User := :parameter.P_user;

 RETURN ;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :GLOBAL.SELECT_CLICK = 5 THEN

 :GLOBAL.button_count := :GLOBAL.button_count + 1;
 if :GLOBAL.button_count = 3 then
 call('S379');
 --HOST('c:\WINNT\system32\sol.exe');
 go_item('one.ac_type');
 :GLOBAL.BUTTON_COUNT := 0;
 :GLOBAL.SELECT_CLICK := 0;
 clear_message;
 END IF;
ELSE
 clear_form; 
 DO_KEY('EXIT');
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :global.win_os = 'XP' then
 IF :ONE.BASENAME IS NULL THEN
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\COMMANDS\ADAM.INI','ADAM','BASENAME','NEW',FALSE);
 ELSE
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\COMMANDS\ADAM.INI','ADAM','BASENAME',:ONE.BASENAME,FALSE);
 END IF;
else
 IF :ONE.BASENAME IS NULL THEN
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\CONFIG\ADAM.INI','ADAM','BASENAME','NEW',FALSE);
 ELSE
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\CONFIG\ADAM.INI','ADAM','BASENAME',:ONE.BASENAME,FALSE);
 END IF;
end if; 

HIDE_VIEW('BASELIST');
MESSAGE('Note: Changing the "Default" login base does NOT affect THIS session, only later sessions. - For this session, you will be logged into '||:global.connect_string, Acknowledge);
synchronize;
MESSAGE('Note: Changing the "Default" login base does NOT affect THIS session, only later sessions. - For this session, you will be logged into '||:global.connect_string, no_Acknowledge);
GO_ITEM('ONE.AC_TYPE');

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_DEFAULTS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE SET_DEFAULTS IS
 CURSOR AF_WUC IS
 SELECT WUC FROM TBL02_ECIR
 WHERE AC_TYPE = :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE
 AND TYPE = 'A';
 CURSOR AF_REFDES IS
 SELECT parent_id||system_id FROM TBL48_REF_DES
 WHERE AC_TYPE = :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE
 AND TYPE = 'A';

BEGIN
 :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE := :ONE.AC_TYPE ;
 :GLOBAL.FIXER := :ONE.FIXER ;
 :GLOBAL.FIXER_UNIT := :GLOBAL.FIXER;
IF :GLOBAL.AC_TYPE != '177' THEN
 OPEN AF_WUC;
 FETCH AF_WUC INTO :GLOBAL.AF_DESIGNATOR;
 CLOSE AF_WUC;
ELSE
 OPEN AF_REFDES;
 FETCH AF_REFDES INTO :GLOBAL.AF_DESIGNATOR;
 CLOSE AF_REFDES;
END IF; 
 
 
END ;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_FAILURE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE CHECK_FAILURE IS
BEGIN
 IF NOT FORM_SUCCESS THEN
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
END ;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_UPDATE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE check_update IS

 CURSOR UPD IS
 SELECT UPDATE_NUM, UPD_DIR, DEST_DIR, DEST_DIR_W7, SERVERNAME
 FROM adam.AUTO_UPDATE
 ORDER BY UPDATE_NUM;

 v_UPDATE_NUM VARCHAR2(6); 
 v_UPD_DIR VARCHAR2(255);
 v_DEST_DIR VARCHAR2(255);
 v_DEST_DIR_W7 VARCHAR2(255); -- SCR#3675
 v_path VARCHAR2(255); -- SCR#3675
 v_SERVERNAME VARCHAR2(80);
 UPD_NUM VARCHAR2(6);
 CUR_VER VARCHAR2(6);
 PARAMS VARCHAR2(255);
 errnum NUMBER;
 SDNS_DATE DATE;
 SDNS_MS NUMBER;
 ALERT_BUTTON NUMBER;
 PATH VARCHAR2(255);
 V_OS VARCHAR2(30);
-- outfile text_io.file_type;
-- filename varchar2(60);
 
BEGIN
 TOOL_ENV.GETVAR('APPDATA',path);
 if instr(path,'Document') > 0 then
 v_OS := 'XP';
 else
 v_OS :='Win7';
 end if;
-- Not DepADAM. Get current ADAM version from C:\PROGRA~1\ADAM\COMMANDS\ADAM.INI.
 IF V_OS = 'XP' THEN
 CUR_VER := WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.READ_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\COMMANDS\ADAM.INI','ADAM','UPDATE_NUM',TRUE); 
 ELSE 
 CUR_VER := WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.READ_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\CONFIG\ADAM.INI','ADAM','UPDATE_NUM',TRUE); 
 END IF;
 
 CUR_VER := LTRIM(RTRIM(CUR_VER));
-- Get current available version from Database table 
SELECT MAX(UPDATE_NUM) INTO UPD_NUM
 FROM adam.AUTO_UPDATE;

IF TO_NUMBER(CUR_VER) = TO_NUMBER(UPD_NUM) THEN -- If available ver # from Database is = current local ver #, return (NO UPDATE)
 RETURN;
-- If this is a DepADAM, confirm that the last patch updated the database (indicated by an update to the UPDATE_NUM value in AUTO_UPDATE) matching
-- the value in ADAM.INI
ELSIF :GLOBAL.IS_DEP = 'TRUE' THEN

 IF TO_NUMBER(CUR_VER) > TO_NUMBER(UPD_NUM) THEN
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('STOP_ALERT',ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT, 
 'Windows security settings prevented the last database update script from running.'||
 ' Reboot PC and log in using a Windows ADMINISTRATOR account, then rerun the last patch executable.');
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('STOP_ALERT',TITLE, 'Incorrect Database Version'); 
 ALERT_BUTTON := SHOW_ALERT('STOP_ALERT');
 EXIT_FORM;
 END IF;
END IF;
 

-- If this isn't DepADAM, do auto-update
IF :Global.IS_DEP = 'TRUE' THEN
 RETURN;
END IF;
OPEN UPD;
LOOP
 FETCH UPD INTO v_UPDATE_NUM, v_UPD_DIR, v_DEST_DIR, v_DEST_DIR_W7, v_SERVERNAME;
 EXIT WHEN UPD%NOTFOUND;
--message('v_update_num:'||v_UPDATE_NUM||' CUR_VER:'||CUR_VER);
--pause;

 IF to_number(v_UPDATE_NUM) <= to_number(CUR_VER) THEN
 NULL;
 ELSE 
-- -- bell;
 SHOW_VIEW('UPDATE_MESSAGE');
 MESSAGE('Auto-Updating ADAM program files. Please wait...'||v_UPDATE_NUM,NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 MESSAGE('Auto-Updating ADAM program files. Please wait...'||v_UPDATE_NUM,NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CURSOR_STYLE,'BUSY');
 -- If we are updating files in the "SCREENS" dir, assume we'll always be updating "WELCOME".
 -- Win2k Doesn't allow WELCOME.FMX to be overwritten when in use, but it DOES allow it to be renamed, therefore, we
 -- rename it to ".OLD", then copy new Welcome.fmx in. 
 IF INSTR(upper(v_DEST_DIR), 'SCREENS') > 0 THEN 
 -- Delete old WELCOME.OLD if it exists
 WIN_API_UTILITY.DELETE_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\SCREENS\WELCOME.OLD', FALSE);
 -- Rename has to be done via HOST command because there is no REN command in the D2KWUTIL library.
 PARAMS := 'REN '||:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\SCREENS\WELCOME.FMX WELCOME.OLD';
 HOST(PARAMS,NO_SCREEN);
 END IF;
 
 -- Same stuff for Menu_Menu.mmx if menus are being auto-updated.
 IF INSTR(UPPER(V_DEST_DIR), 'MENUS') > 0 THEN
 -- Delete old MENU_MENU.OLD if it exists
 WIN_API_UTILITY.DELETE_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\MENUS\MENU_MENU.OLD', FALSE);
 -- Rename has to be done via HOST command because there is no REN command in the D2KWUTIL library.
 PARAMS := 'REN '||:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\MENUS\MENU_MENU.MMX MENU_MENU.OLD';
 HOST(PARAMS,NO_SCREEN);
 END IF;
 
 -- Copy files from server directory to Client directory
 --
 -- SCR#3675 - use different path depending on O/S
 -- 
 
 IF INSTR(:GLOBAL.ADAM_BATCH_PATH,'Legacy') > 0 THEN -- OS is Win7
 PARAMS := 'XCopy \\'||v_SERVERNAME||'\'||v_UPD_DIR||'\*.* '||v_DEST_DIR_W7||' /R /Q /Y';
 ELSE
 PARAMS := 'XCopy \\'||v_SERVERNAME||'\'||v_UPD_DIR||'\*.* '||v_DEST_DIR||' /R /Q /Y';
 END IF; 
--outfile := text_io.fopen('C:\programdata\adam\cmd_line'||v_update_num||'.txt','w');
--text_io.put_line(outfile, params);
--text_io.fclose(outfile);

 HOST(PARAMS,NO_SCREEN); 
 -- Update the INI to the newest number
 if V_OS = 'XP' THEN
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\COMMANDS\ADAM.INI','ADAM','UPDATE_NUM',v_UPDATE_NUM,TRUE); 
 else
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\CONFIG\ADAM.INI','ADAM','UPDATE_NUM',v_UPDATE_NUM,TRUE); 
 end if;

 END IF; 
END LOOP;

HIDE_VIEW('UPDATE_MESSAGE');
SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CURSOR_STYLE,'DEFAULT');
-- bell;
-- bell;
-- bell;
-- bell;
MESSAGE('Update Check Complete.',NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);

 BEGIN
 -- Look to see that a WELCOME.FMX exists. If not, rename WELCOME.OLD to WELCOME.FMX and display message.
 WIN_API_UTILITY.COPY_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\SCREENS\WELCOME.FMX',:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\SCRATCH\WELCOME.FMX',TRUE);
 WIN_API_UTILITY.DELETE_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\SCRATCH\WELCOME.FMX', TRUE);
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 PARAMS := 'REN '||:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\ADAM\SCREENS\WELCOME.OLD WELCOME.FMX';
 HOST(PARAMS,NO_SCREEN);
 SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CURSOR_STYLE, 'DEFAULT');
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 MESSAGE('Failure in auto-update (001) Error '||SQLCODE||' Please report error message to ADAM Support');
 END;

 BEGIN
 -- Look to see that MENU_MENU.MMX exists. If not, rename MENU_MENU.OLD to MENU_MENU.MMX.
 WIN_API_UTILITY.COPY_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\SCREENS\MENU_MENU.MMX',:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\SCRATCH\MENU_MENU.MMX',TRUE);
 WIN_API_UTILITY.DELETE_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\SCRATCH\MENU_MENU.MMX', TRUE);

 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 PARAMS := 'REN '||:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\ADAM\SCREENS\MENU_MENU.OLD MENU_MENU.MMX';
 HOST(PARAMS,NO_SCREEN);
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 MESSAGE('Failure in auto-update (002) Error '||SQLCODE||' Please report error message to ADAM Support');
 END;

EXCEPTION
WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CURSOR_STYLE, 'DEFAULT');
 HIDE_VIEW('UPDATE_MESSAGE');
 MESSAGE('Auto-update has encountered a problem and ADAM has not been updated. Contact ADAM support. '||v_UPDATE_NUM,ACKNOWLEDGE);
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 MESSAGE('Auto-update has encountered a problem and ADAM has not been updated. Contact ADAM support. '||v_UPDATE_NUM,NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 if v_os = 'XP' then
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\COMMANDS\ADAM.INI','ADAM','UPDATE_NUM',v_UPDATE_NUM,FALSE); 
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\COMMANDS\ADAM.INI','ADAM','BASENAME',:GLOBAL.INI_CONNECT,FALSE); 
 else
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\CONFIG\ADAM.INI','ADAM','UPDATE_NUM',v_UPDATE_NUM,FALSE); 
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\CONFIG\ADAM.INI','ADAM','BASENAME',:GLOBAL.INI_CONNECT,FALSE); 
 end if;
 :GLOBAL.INI_CONNECT := UPPER(:GLOBAL.INI_CONNECT);
WHEN OTHERS THEN
 MESSAGE('Failure in auto-update (003) Error '||SQLCODE||' Please report error message to ADAM Support');
 pause;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: GO_ADAM_SITE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE GO_ADAM_SITE IS
 EXPL_PATH VARCHAR2(200);
 w_address VARCHAR2(200);
BEGIN

 SELECT address INTO w_address FROM TBL27_WEB;

 EXPL_PATH := WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.READ_REGISTRY('HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\MICROSOFT\WINDOWS\CURRENTVERSION\APP PATHS\IEXPLORE.EXE','',TRUE);
 EXPL_PATH := EXPL_PATH||' '||RTRIM(w_address);
 IF :GLOBAL.IS_DEP = 'FALSE' THEN
 WIN_API_SHELL.WINEXEC(EXPL_PATH);
 IF NOT Form_Success THEN 
 Message('Error -- Could not launch Internet Explorer. Please contact your ADAM Administrator.',ACKNOWLEDGE);
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 Message('Error -- Could not launch Internet Explorer. Please contact your ADAM Administrator.',NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 END IF; 
 ELSE
 MESSAGE('ADAM Website is only available from Home ADAM, while connected to the base LAN.',ACKNOWLEDGE);
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 MESSAGE('ADAM Website is only available from Home ADAM, while connected to the base LAN.',NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 disable_item('HELP','WEB_SITE');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 Message('Error -- Could not launch Internet Explorer. Please contact your ADAM Administrator.',ACKNOWLEDGE);
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 Message('Error -- Could not launch Internet Explorer. Please contact your ADAM Administrator.',NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: GO_HELP
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE GO_HELP IS 
 HELP_ADDRESS VARCHAR2(100);
 EXPL_PATH VARCHAR2(100);
BEGIN

 SELECT help_address INTO help_address FROM TBL27_WEB;

 IF :GLOBAL.IS_DEP = 'FALSE' THEN
 EXPL_PATH := WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.READ_REGISTRY('HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\MICROSOFT\WINDOWS\CURRENTVERSION\APP PATHS\IEXPLORE.EXE','',TRUE);
 EXPL_PATH := EXPL_PATH||' '||RTRIM(help_address);
 WIN_API_SHELL.WINEXEC(EXPL_PATH);
 IF NOT Form_Success THEN 
 Message('Error -- Could not launch Internet Explorer. Please contact your ADAM Administrator.',ACKNOWLEDGE);
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 Message('Error -- Could not launch Internet Explorer. Please contact your ADAM Administrator.',NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 END IF; 
 ELSE
 EXPL_PATH := '"C:\Program Files\Adobe\Acrobat 4.0\Reader\AcroRd32.exe"';
 WIN_API_SHELL.WINEXEC(EXPL_PATH);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 END IF;


EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 Message('Error -- Could not launch Internet Explorer. Please contact your ADAM Administrator.',ACKNOWLEDGE);
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 Message('Error -- Could not launch Internet Explorer. Please contact your ADAM Administrator.',NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PLACE_WINDOW
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PLACE_WINDOW IS 
screen_height NUMBER; 
screen_width NUMBER; 
window_height NUMBER; 
window_width NUMBER; 
INI_POS_X NUMBER;
INI_POS_Y NUMBER;
user_role varchar2(40);
path varchar2(255);

BEGIN 
WIN_API_SESSION.Change_MDI_Icon(win_api_utility.get_active_window,:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\SCREENS\ICONS\ADAM.ICO',0); 
Set_Window_Property(FORMS_MDI_WINDOW, WINDOW_SIZE, 1000,607); 

IF :GLOBAL.USER = 'STUDENT' THEN
 Set_Window_Property(FORMS_MDI_WINDOW, TITLE, ' ADAM / SIMA -- STUDENT STUDENT STUDENT STUDENT STUDENT STUDENT STUDENT STUDENT STUDENT'); 
 Set_Window_Property(FORMS_MDI_WINDOW, FOREGROUND_COLOR, 'RED');
ELSE
 
IF INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, 'CONTROL_RECORDS') > 0 THEN
 USER_ROLE := 'AMCRO';
ELSIF INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, 'SERVICING') > 0 THEN
 USER_ROLE := 'Servicing';
ELSIF INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, 'TECHNICIAN') > 0 THEN
 USER_ROLE := 'Technician';
ELSIF INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, 'SUPERVISING') > 0 THEN
 USER_ROLE := 'Supervisor';
ELSIF INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, 'VIEWING') > 0 THEN
 USER_ROLE := 'Read Only';
ELSIF INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, 'IMPOUNDING') > 0 THEN
 USER_ROLE := 'Impound';
ELSIF INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, 'FSR') > 0 THEN
 USER_ROLE := 'FSR (Read Only)';
ELSE
 USER_ROLE := 'None';
END IF;

 Set_Window_Property(FORMS_MDI_WINDOW, TITLE, ' ADAM/SIMA -- Username/Utilisateur: '||:GLOBAL.USER||' - Base: '||upper(GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CONNECT_STRING))||
 ' - Access/Accès: '||user_role); 
END IF;

screen_height := GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(DISPLAY_HEIGHT); 
screen_width := GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(DISPLAY_WIDTH); 
window_height := GET_WINDOW_PROPERTY(FORMS_MDI_WINDOW, HEIGHT); 
window_width := GET_WINDOW_PROPERTY(FORMS_MDI_WINDOW, WIDTH); 

 TOOL_ENV.GETVAR('APPDATA',path);
 if instr(path,'Document') > 0 then
 INI_POS_X := WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.READ_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\COMMANDS\ADAM.INI','ADAM','POS_X',FALSE); 
 INI_POS_Y := WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.READ_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\COMMANDS\ADAM.INI','ADAM','POS_Y',FALSE);
 else
 INI_POS_X := WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.READ_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\CONFIG\ADAM.INI','ADAM','POS_X',FALSE); 
 INI_POS_Y := WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.READ_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\CONFIG\ADAM.INI','ADAM','POS_Y',FALSE); 
 end if;

IF INI_POS_X != (screen_width - window_width)/2 AND
 INI_POS_Y != ((screen_height - window_height)/2)-50 THEN
 
 SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY(FORMS_MDI_WINDOW, X_POS, INI_POS_X); 
 SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY(FORMS_MDI_WINDOW, Y_POS, INI_POS_Y); 
ELSE
 SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY(FORMS_MDI_WINDOW, X_POS, 
 (screen_width - window_width)/2); 
 SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY(FORMS_MDI_WINDOW, Y_POS, 
 ((screen_height - window_height)/2)-50); 
END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_PASSWORD
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE CHECK_PASSWORD IS
 ALERT_BUTTON NUMBER;
BEGIN
 IF Get_Application_Property(PASSWORD) = 'N1712S' THEN
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('STOP_ALERT', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT, 'This is the first time you have used this account. You must now change your password. / Pour votre premier accès à ce compte, vous devez maintenant changer le mot de passe.');
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('STOP_ALERT', TITLE, 'New User/Nouvel utilisateur');
 ALERT_BUTTON := SHOW_ALERT('STOP_ALERT');
 CALL('SPASS');
 END IF;
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_SDNS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE CHECK_SDNS IS
 SDNS_FILE_DATE DATE;
 SDNS_MS NUMBER;
 STORED_SDNS_DATE DATE;
 
 CURSOR SYS_SDNS_DATE IS
 SELECT SYS_SDNS_DATE FROM TBL27_WEB; 
 path VARCHAR2(255);
BEGIN

 TOOL_ENV.GETVAR('APPDATA',path); -- use forms function to get environment variable
 IF INSTR(path,'Documents') > 0 THEN -- OS is XP
 WIN_API_FILE.MODIFIED_DATE('C:\PROGRA~1\ADAM\DEV6I\PATCH18\NET80\NAMES\SDNS.ORA', SDNS_FILE_DATE, SDNS_MS, TRUE);
 ELSE
 WIN_API_FILE.MODIFIED_DATE('C:\ADAM\LEGACY\DEV6I\PATCH18\NET80\NAMES\SDNS.ORA', SDNS_FILE_DATE, SDNS_MS, TRUE);
 END IF;
 OPEN SYS_SDNS_DATE;
 FETCH SYS_SDNS_DATE INTO STORED_SDNS_DATE;
--MESSAGE('SYS_SDNS_DATE='||TO_CHAR(STORED_SDNS_DATE,'DD-MON-YYYY HH24MI'));
--PAUSE;
--MESSAGE('SDNS_FILE_DATE='||TO_CHAR(SDNS_FILE_DATE,'DD-MON-YYYY HH24MI'));
--PAUSE;

 IF SYS_SDNS_DATE%NOTFOUND THEN
 STORED_SDNS_DATE := TO_DATE('04-OCT-1961 0800','DD-MON-YYYY HH24MI');
 END IF;
 CLOSE SYS_SDNS_DATE;
 
 IF SDNS_FILE_DATE < STORED_SDNS_DATE THEN
--MESSAGE('DOING EXCEPTION');
--PAUSE;
 RAISE NO_DATA_FOUND;
 END IF;
EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
--MESSAGE('IN EXCEPTION');
--PAUSE;
 -- bell;
 MESSAGE('Updating network connection details. Please wait...',NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 MESSAGE('Updating network connection details. Please wait...',NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 SHOW_VIEW('UPDATE_MESSAGE');
 SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CURSOR_STYLE,'BUSY');
 TOOL_ENV.GETVAR('APPDATA',path); -- use forms function to get environment variable
 IF INSTR(path,'Documents') > 0 THEN -- OS is XP
 HOST('C:\PROGRA~1\ADAM\DEV6I\PATCH18\BIN\NAMESCTL80 REORDER_NS',NO_SCREEN);
 ELSE
 HOST('C:\LEGACY\ADAM\DEV6I\PATCH18\BIN\NAMESCTL80 REORDER_NS',NO_SCREEN);
 END IF;
 HIDE_VIEW('UPDATE_MESSAGE');
 SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CURSOR_STYLE,'DEFAULT');
 MESSAGE('Network Update Complete.',NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 SYNCHRONIZE;
--MESSAGE('DONE EXCEPTION');
--PAUSE;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 raise; -- propogate exception up
END;

RecordGroup.Name: FIXER_UNIT_LOV
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT FIXER_UNIT, DESCRIPTION FROM TBL03_FIXER_UNIT A
 WHERE FIXER_UNIT IN (SELECT DISTINCT FIXER_UNIT
 FROM FIL21_LOCK_UNLOCK_AIRCRAFT B
 WHERE B.AC_TYPE = :ONE.AC_TYPE)
 OR (NOT EXISTS (SELECT AC_TYPE FROM FIL21_LOCK_UNLOCK_AIRCRAFT WHERE AC_TYPE = :ONE.AC_TYPE))

RecordGroup.Name: AC_TYPE_LOV
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select distinct a.ac_type, a.ac_nomenclature, a.ac_nomenclature_f from tbl00_aircraft_type a, tbl10_ROLE_security b where 
b.username = :GLOBAL.USER 
AND BITAND(B.ACCESSIBLE_AC_TYPE, A.BINARY_INDEX_NO)+ 0 > 0

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 v_os VARCHAR2(30);
BEGIN
/* To change the Version Number/title for the MDI window, go to PLACE_WINDOW program unit. */
DECLARE
 CUR_VER VARCHAR2(6);
 path VARCHAR2(255);
 
BEGIN

 DBMS_APPLICATION_INFO.SET_CLIENT_INFO('ADAM_TRUE');
 WIN_API.PRELOAD;
 HIDE_VIEW('BASELIST');
 --
 -- SCR#3675 - April 2013 - removed hard-coded paths. Determine path based on O/S ....JH
 --
 TOOL_ENV.GETVAR('APPDATA',path); -- use forms function to get environment variable
 IF INSTR(path,'Documents') > 0 THEN -- OS is XP
 v_os := 'XP';
 -- Simple way to check for the existance of a particular file - If QKADAM.BAT exists, this must be DepADAM.
 -- If file doesn't exist, COPY_FILE built-in will return a NO_DATA_FOUND exception (Showing this is a Home ADAM)
 WIN_API_UTILITY.COPY_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\INSTALL\QKADAM.BAT', :GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\SCRATCH\QKADAM.BAT',TRUE,TRUE); 
 ELSE -- It's not XP - probably Windows 7 check for C:\ProgramData\ADAM\Config\DepADAM.manifest
 v_os := 'Win7';
 -- Simple way to check for the existance of a particular file - If DepADAM.manifest exists, this must be DepADAM.
 -- If file doesn't exist, COPY_FILE built-in will return a NO_DATA_FOUND exception (Showing this is a Home ADAM)
 WIN_API_UTILITY.COPY_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\Config\DepADAM.Manifest', :GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\SCRATCH\DepADAM.manifest',TRUE,TRUE); 
 END IF;
 :global.win_OS := v_os;
 -- Double-check to see if user is using a DepADAM, but connecting to the LAN (using it as a Home ADAM)
 -- If user-entered CONNECT string is different than the stored connect string (in ADAM.ini)
 -- there must be a LAN connection, therefore, do an Auto-Update.
 :GLOBAL.CONNECT_STRING := GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CONNECT_STRING);
 
 
 if v_os = 'XP' then
 CUR_VER := WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.READ_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\COMMANDS\ADAM.INI','ADAM','UPDATE_NUM',FALSE); 
 else 
 CUR_VER := WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.READ_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\CONFIG\ADAM.INI','ADAM','UPDATE_NUM',FALSE); 
 end if;

 :GLOBAL.CONNECT_STRING := UPPER(:GLOBAL.CONNECT_STRING);
 if :global.connect_string is null then
 :global.connect_string := 'NEW';
 end if;
 
 IF :GLOBAL.CONNECT_STRING = 'DEPADAM' THEN
 :GLOBAL.IS_DEP := 'TRUE';
 ELSE
 :GLOBAL.IS_DEP := 'FALSE';
 END IF;
 
EXCEPTION
 /* File was not found - This must be Home ADAM*/
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :GLOBAL.IS_DEP := 'FALSE';
 :GLOBAL.CONNECT_STRING := GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CONNECT_STRING);
 :global.win_OS := v_OS;

END;

DECLARE 
 CUR_VER VARCHAR2(6);
 ALERT_BUTTON NUMBER;
 AC_COUNT NUMBER;
 v_cnt_adam NUMBER := 0;
 v_cnt_student NUMBER := 0;
 v_alert_id alert;
 v_alert_btn NUMBER;
 v_initial_client_ver VARCHAR2(6) := '6400';
 Cursor c_ora_path is SELECT ORA_HOME_SHARE FROM TBL27_WEB;
 Cursor c_ora64_path is SELECT ORA64_HOME_SHARE FROM TBL27_WEB;
 dbversion VARCHAR2(255);
 BN VARCHAR2(40);
 
BEGIN
--
--
-- Added by Scott Morrow - 20 Jan 1997
-- Creates a global variable called "OS". for Operating System.
-- OS = 0 for VMS, 1 for anything else.
-- Create Global Variables to be used when calling reports directly from screens

:global.queue_name := '';
:GLOBAL.USER := GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(USERNAME);
:GLOBAL.OS := '1';
:Parameter.P_User := :Global.USER;
:One.User := :Parameter.P_User;
:GLOBAL.WUC := '';
:GLOBAL.SERIAL := '';
:GLOBAL.AC_NUMBER := '';
:GLOBAL.SUPP_DATA := '';
:GLOBAL.LIFE_IND := '';
:GLOBAL.CONTROL_NO := '';
:GLOBAL.SORT_OPTION := '';
:GLOBAL.F_DATE := '';
:GLOBAL.POSITION := '';
:GLOBAL.SERIAL := '';
:GLOBAL.INSTALL_CART := '';
:GLOBAL.BUTTON_COUNT := 0;
:GLOBAL.SELECT_CLICK := 0;
:GLOBAL.CR_KEY := '9F53DA70CC29DB33'; 
:GLOBAL.RACSTA_FLAG := '';
:GLOBAL.AIRCRAFT_STATE := '';
:GLOBAL.SCREEN_TITLE := '';
:GLOBAL.TRADE := '';
:GLOBAL.WRA_FLAG := '';
:GLOBAL.NEW_WRA := '';
:GLOBAL.AF_DESIGNATOR := ''; -- Oct 23, 2007, Calian, PL. Initial to NULL first.
:GLOBAL.QUERY_ONLY := '';
:GLOBAL.ORA_HOME_PATH := ''; -- SCR#2647 .. April 2013, JH
PLACE_WINDOW;

-- Apr 5, 2013, Antian, JH. SCR# 2647
if v_os = 'XP' then
 OPEN c_ora_path; FETCH c_ora_path INTO :GLOBAL.ORA_HOME_PATH; CLOSE c_ora_path;
else
 OPEN c_ora64_path; FETCH c_ora64_path INTO :GLOBAL.ORA_HOME_PATH; CLOSE c_ora64_path;
end if;

-- Apr 5, 2006, Calian, PL. SCR# 1820.
IF :GLOBAL.IS_DEP = 'FALSE' AND :GLOBAL.USER = 'STUDENT' THEN
 -- only table with flag3 set is suppose to be in the STUDENT database
 SELECT count(*) INTO v_cnt_adam
 FROM ADAM.tbl40_table_list
 WHERE flag3 = '1';

 -- make sure the student schema has the all the tables with flag3 set 
 SELECT count(*) INTO v_cnt_student
 FROM all_tables
 WHERE owner = 'STUDENT' 
 AND table_name IN (
 SELECT table_name 
 FROM ADAM.tbl40_table_list 
 WHERE flag3 = '1');

 IF v_cnt_student < v_cnt_adam THEN
 v_alert_id := find_alert('STOP_ALERT');
 set_alert_property(v_alert_id, alert_message_text,
 'The STUDENT database is invalid. Ask AMCRO to refresh it.');
 v_alert_btn := show_alert(v_alert_id);
 
 exit_form;
 END IF; 
END IF;

-- End of Global Variable Creation
-- Check for Auto-Update
-- Read value from ADAM.INI - If ADAM.INI doesn't exist, a WHEN OTHERS exception
-- is raised (Handled below)
 if v_os = 'XP' then
 :GLOBAL.INI_CONNECT := WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.READ_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\COMMANDS\ADAM.INI','ADAM','BASENAME',TRUE); 
 CUR_VER := WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.READ_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\COMMANDS\ADAM.INI','ADAM','UPDATE_NUM',TRUE); 
 else
 :GLOBAL.INI_CONNECT := WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.READ_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\CONFIG\ADAM.INI','ADAM','BASENAME',TRUE); 
 CUR_VER := WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.READ_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\CONFIG\ADAM.INI','ADAM','UPDATE_NUM',TRUE); 
 end if;
 :GLOBAL.INI_CONNECT := UPPER(:GLOBAL.INI_CONNECT);

 CUR_VER := LTRIM(RTRIM(CUR_VER));

 IF :GLOBAL.IS_DEP = 'FALSE' AND :GLOBAL.CONNECT_STRING NOT IN ('DEPADAM', 'NETWORK') THEN
 select version into dbversion from product_component_version where product like 'PL/SQL%';
 if substr(dbversion,1,1) = '9' Then
 CHECK_SDNS; -- Any updates for ONAMES? (but only on database 9i)
 else
 null; -- no Onames on Win 7
 End if;
 END IF; 
 check_update;-- Any application updates?
 
 CHECK_PASSWORD;
-- Notify proper use if acount = 'SUPERVISOR' else if ADAM_ADMIN, call UT10
 IF INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, 'SUPERVISING') > 0 THEN
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('WARNING_ALERT', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT, 'The SUPERVISOR account is used for REMOVING signatures to correct open forms ONLY, not for signing off 349s. Use TECHN for closing forms.');
 SET_ALERT_PROPERTY('WARNING_ALERT', TITLE, 'Supervisor Access Info'); 
 ALERT_BUTTON := SHOW_ALERT('WARNING_ALERT'); 
 ELSIF INSTR(:GLOBAL.ROLE_LIST, 'ADAM_ADMINISTRATOR') > 0 THEN
 SELECT COUNT(*) INTO AC_COUNT FROM ADAM.TBL00_AIRCRAFT_TYPE;
 IF AC_COUNT = 0 THEN
 MESSAGE('Validation tables must be imported before accessing the User Management screen.',ACKNOWLEDGE);
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 MESSAGE('Validation tables must be imported before accessing the User Management screen.',NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 EXIT_FORM;
 ELSE
 -- 
 -- Mar 10, 2006, Calian, PL. SCR# 1820. Display the ADAM Administrator screen if not connected to DepADAM.
 --
 IF :GLOBAL.IS_DEP = 'TRUE' THEN
 CALL_FORM('UT10_B');
 ELSE
 CALL_FORM('MADMIN_E');
 END IF;
 EXIT_FORM;
 END IF;
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CURSOR_STYLE, 'DEFAULT');
 :GLOBAL.INI_CONNECT := UPPER(:GLOBAL.INI_CONNECT);
 if v_os = 'XP' then
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\COMMANDS\ADAM.INI','ADAM','BASENAME',:GLOBAL.INI_CONNECT,FALSE); 
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\COMMANDS\ADAM.INI','ADAM','UPDATE_NUM',v_initial_client_ver,FALSE); 
 else
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\CONFIG\ADAM.INI','ADAM','BASENAME',:GLOBAL.INI_CONNECT,FALSE); 
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\CONFIG\ADAM.INI','ADAM','UPDATE_NUM',v_initial_client_ver,FALSE); 
 end if;
 check_update;

 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 -- This exception fires if ADAM.INI file exists in C:\PROGRA~1\ADAM\COMMANDS
 -- The INI file is created with a version no of v_INITIAL_CLIENT_VER - The baseline for ADAM.
 :GLOBAL.INI_CONNECT := UPPER(:GLOBAL.INI_CONNECT);
 if v_os = 'XP' then
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\COMMANDS\ADAM.INI','ADAM','BASENAME',:GLOBAL.INI_CONNECT); 
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\COMMANDS\ADAM.INI','ADAM','UPDATE_NUM',v_initial_client_ver); 
 else
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\CONFIG\ADAM.INI','ADAM','BASENAME',:GLOBAL.INI_CONNECT); 
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\CONFIG\ADAM.INI','ADAM','UPDATE_NUM',v_initial_client_ver); 
 end if;
 check_update;

 END;
END;

Trigger.Name: KEY-EXIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 DECLARE
 POS_X NUMBER;
 POS_Y NUMBER;
 WIN_X NUMBER;
 PATH VARCHAR2(255);
 BEGIN
 
 CLEAR_RECORD ;

 POS_X := GET_WINDOW_PROPERTY(FORMS_MDI_WINDOW, X_POS); 
 POS_Y := GET_WINDOW_PROPERTY(FORMS_MDI_WINDOW, Y_POS); 


 IF POS_X < 0 THEN 
 POS_X := 1;
 END IF;
 IF POS_Y < 0 THEN 
 POS_Y := 1;
 END IF;
 TOOL_ENV.GETVAR('APPDATA',path);
 if instr(path,'Document') > 0 then
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\COMMANDS\ADAM.INI','ADAM','POS_X',POS_X,FALSE); 
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\COMMANDS\ADAM.INI','ADAM','POS_Y',POS_Y,FALSE); 
 else 
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\CONFIG\ADAM.INI','ADAM','POS_X',POS_X,FALSE); 
 WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.WRITE_INI_FILE(:GLOBAL.ADAM_PATH||'\CONFIG\ADAM.INI','ADAM','POS_Y',POS_Y,FALSE); 
 end if;
 EXIT_FORM ;
 END;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-WINDOW-ACTIVATED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DBMS_APPLICATION_INFO.SET_CLIENT_INFO('ADAM_TRUE');

begin
DECLARE X number;
 begin
 x := POPULATE_GROUP('AC_TYPE_LOV');
-- Populate_List('AC_TYPE_LOV','AC_TYPE_LOV'); 

 x := POPULATE_GROUP('FIXER_UNIT_LOV');
-- Populate_List('ONE.FIXER_UNIT_LOV','FIXER_UNIT_LOV'); 
 
IF :GLOBAL.IS_DEP = 'TRUE' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONE.CLICK_HERE',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ONE.CHANGE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
END IF;

GO_ITEM('ONE.AC_TYPE');
 end;
end;


IF :GLOBAL.EXIT = 'TRUE' THEN
 EXIT_FORM(NO_VALIDATE);
ELSE
 REPLACE_MENU('STANDARD_MENU');
 REPLACE_MENU('MENU_MENU');
 disable_item('ACTION','CH_AC_TYPE');
 disable_item('HELP','CFTO_URL');
END IF;

Trigger.Name: ON-LOGON
Trigger.TriggerText:
<<TOP>>
 CALL_FORM('LOGON', NO_HIDE);

IF :GLOBAL.LOGGED_ON = 'CANCEL' THEN
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
ELSIF :GLOBAL.LOGGED_ON != 'TRUE' THEN
 MESSAGE('Invalid Login Information. Please re-enter.', ACKNOWLEDGE);
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 MESSAGE('Invalid Login Information. Please re-enter.', NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 CLEAR_MESSAGE;
GOTO TOP;
ELSE
 -- Mar 26, 2007, Calian, PL. SCR# 2337.
 IF get_application_property(username)= 'ADAM_MGR' THEN
 REPLACE_MENU('STANDARD_MENU');
 REPLACE_MENU('MENU_MENU');
 call_form('menu_b');
 RAISE form_trigger_failure;
 END IF;
END IF;
